What?

Well, this section should either show a start page, perhaps with recent searches or popular links, or a search results page listing the current results.
  • Try searching for a link (tip: Google, Bing and Wikipedia)
  • Try searching for a country or a city in the searchbox
  • Try searching with a time/date constraint
  • Try searching with a key/value constraint (tip: start typing Nationality)
  • Try searching for something completely different
